sourceMeaningMnemonic: You create a <radical>thread</radical> with someone by <radical>call</radical>ing out to them to <kanji>introduce</kanji> yourself.
meaningInfo: You literally call out, and when they turn around, tie a thread to them, so you'll never forget that you introduced yourselves to each other.
readingMnemonic: You want to <kanji>introduce</kanji> yourself to the <reading>Shou</reading>gun (<ja>しょう</ja>) but no matter how much you call out, he won't come close enough for you to tie your introduction thread to him. You call louder and louder, "SHOUGUN LET ME INTRODUCE MYSELF!"
readingInfo: Finally the Shougun sighs and turns toward you. You call out your name and get the thread around him. Uh oh. He doesn't look happy.
